category.label: Application Server
category.description: This category contains features required for WSO2 Application Server

category.label: Application Server Runtimes (Optional)
category.description: This category contains features required for WSO2 Application Server Runtimes - CXF and J2EE. CXF feature is also included under Application Server category as well.

category.label: Data Services Server
category.description: This category contains features required for WSO2 Data Services Server

category.label: Identity Server
category.description: This category contains features required for WSO2 Identity Server
